qubo_util module¶

qubo_util.add_lin_in(prob: GraphPathProblem, Q, j, val)¶

Add lineaire incoming term from node j

qubo_util.add_lin_out(prob: GraphPathProblem, Q, i, val)¶

Add lineaire outgoing term from node i

qubo_util.add_quad_in(prob: GraphPathProblem, Q, i, val)¶

Computes the QUBO matrix for quadratique term of a input node i
